mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_allocation ORDER BY start_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_allocation (resource_id, project_id, start_time, end_time, status, remark) VALUES (#{resourceId}, #{projectId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_allocation SET resource_id = #{resourceId}, project_id = #{projectId}, start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, status = #{status}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
